subject: AM Brief: Mon, 30 Sep 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-off. Base metals were volatile amid concerns over Sudanese Pound.

**Key Event Today:** China PMI at 15:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Erdman - Wuckert upgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Articulus cubicularis strenuus decumbo tollo comedo explicabo vetus.
- AFR: Atavus vacuus voro titulus nemo tubineus.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Building Update: Scheduled Fire Drill
body:
Dear Occupants,

A scheduled fire drill will be conducted this Wednesday morning between 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM. All building employees must participate.

Please follow instructions from your floor wardens. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Kind regards,
Nathan Wright

--
Nathan Wright
Building Manager
101 Collins Street Management
Level 31, 101 Collins Street, Melbourne VIC 3000
Tel: +61 3 8636 5000

subject: Follow-up: Zulauf, Bergnaum and Wehner investment committee meeting
body:
Hi Thomas,

Good to connect with you last week.

I'm following up on the investment committee meeting. We require an update by EOD tomorrow for our trustees.

Could you please provide a status update?

Kind regards,
Robert Singh

--
